org.grouplens.lenskit.slopeone

Class SlopeOneModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.slopeone.SlopeOneModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @DefaultProvider(value=SlopeOneModelBuilder.class)
 @Shareable
public class SlopeOneModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A model for a SlopeOneItemScorer or WeightedSlopeOneItemScorer. Stores calculated deviation values and number of co-rating users for each item pair.
    See Also:
